lead_paragraph: FIFA presidential candidate Tokyo Sexwale has been called to appear before the South African Football Association (SAFA) to answer questions about a lackluster election campaign, SAFA said on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Sexwale Asked to Explain Lackluster FIFA Campaign
headline.main: Sexwale Asked to Explain Lackluster FIFA Campaign
